notesStmt.note:
Prose description. Use the following as model
Fragment in the Bodleian Library, Oxford. Covers Bava Qamma 4:1 - 9:5
Transcription from online images of the manuscript, available at http://genizah.bodleian.ox.ac.uk/home
EDITED BY: Hayim Lapin
TRANSCRIPTION: Shlomo Strauss

handDesc.handNote:
Corrections to the text in the same color as the pointing are attributed to h2. 11th - 13th C.

ab.note: There is an insertion mark above the deleted word, but no erasure as in line 23.
